alert.note: Alert for Brown (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 9:56PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN BROWN COUNTY THROUGH 1045 PM CDT... At 956 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grosvenor, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Blanket, Byrds, Lake Brownwood Near Thrifty, Grosvenor, Lake Brownwood State Park, May, Cross Cut, Lake Brownwood, Owens, and Thrifty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
